```{r}
url<-"http://wsgw.mass.gov/data/gispub/shape/contours5k/hp214.zip"
download.file(url,destfile=basename(url))
unzip("hp214.zip",exdir="northampton")
```
```{r, message = FALSE}
library(macleish)
library(leaflet)
library(rgeos)
library(sp)
```

```{r}
library(rgdal)
dsn<-path.expand("northampton")
dsn
list.files(dsn)
```

```{r}
orgListLayers(dsn)
```

```{r}
install.packages("macleish")
```

```{r}
library(macleish)
```


```{r}
names(macleish_layers)
```

```{r}
parking <- data.frame(lat = 42.448013, lon = -72.680663)
library(leaflet)
macpark<-leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon, lat = ~lat, data = parking,
    popup = "Parking Lot")%>%
    addCircles(lat = 42.448013, lng = -72.680663, radius = 804.672) 
macpark
```
